Interface ec.ifc.stonelook.HasColorScheme

public interface HasColorScheme
extends Object
Interface that supports getting and setting a color scheme. The color schemes themselves are constants in class StoneLook, such as StoneLook.BLUES and StoneLook.PURPLES.
See Also:
StoneLook

getColorScheme()
returns the current color scheme
setColorScheme(int)
sets the color scheme to a new value

getColorScheme 
  public abstract int getColorScheme()
returns the current color scheme
setColorScheme 
  public abstract void setColorScheme(int newColorScheme)
sets the color scheme to a new value
